Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
rpg.items.Item
rpg.items.Equipment
rpg.items.weapons.Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Equipable
public abstract class Weapon extends Equipment
Clase abstracta que representa un arma en el juego.
